title: Investigating Senior Care Facilities in a Pandemic
description: This investigation examines wage theft and neglect in senior residential care facilities, focusing on the lack of enforcement by regulators and the impact on caregivers and residents. The findings were published in various news outlets and featured in a special report and radio show. The investigation provides strategies for uncovering more cases of labor violations and wrongdoing in the industry.
